title: Bio-based carbon foams assembled with Fe nanoparticles for simultaneous remediation of As, Hg and PAHs in co-contaminated industrial soils
content:

I. Janeiro-Tato, E. Rodríguez, M. A. Lopez-Anton, D. Baragaño, L. Arrojo, P. Parra-Benito, A. I. Peláez, J. R. Gallego
Sucrose foams are novel nanocomposites to remediate co-contaminated soils without affecting pH and EC or Fe availability in the soils.
